column1: litlhare mme masebina oitse udule fatse mona
litlhare tsamaya hodula fatse ka tlung
hoitswe udule fatse ke mme masebina
ha se setulo ntho ena ke letini
ke ena patsi ena fatse mona
ke papa ntho ee jwale phofo e kae
bo butle litlhare ke tsa rona
khaba ekaba efeng mme litlhare jwale
a ke moroho ona ha osophehuwe
litlhare matha ako lata dikhape hle monna
mme litlhare dijana dingata hahao mona
batho bala ba teng mme litlhare
litlhare jwale ha uatle le makhapetla
kake ausi mamello otlatla hojella mona
ngwana wahao ha aesoje le yena
butle kemongwathele mona ngwana enwa wahao
ngwana wahao enoa otloja tsenyenyane feela
hothwe ngwetsi ke moo dintho tseno wena
bashanyana ke bona bayang naheng eseng wena
mme litlhare ska tsamaya ha u moshanyana
litlhare tloo bapale le ngwana enwa
jwale ke mang yaditsetseng ka mahlokwa
ke mang yantsengatsola dijo tsee kediphehile
